Description of incident: A nurse was arrested and charged with grand larceny, ID theft, and scheming to defraud several elderly patients.  The nurse collected patient information and texted it to a co-conspirator.  The co-conspirator then used the information to obtain fraudulent tax returns in the names of the victims.  Over 30 of the 83 victim records found at the co-conspirator's home were from the Brandywyne Health Center.
